bookTitle: True Dummy - a fable of existence
Plot: A story of two ordinary boys and their quest to conquer the world, True Dummy engages with questions about existence, ambition and the meaning and purpose of life while addressing the most soul-searching dilemmas of the human race. The enlightening fable takes you on a timeless journey with its thought-provoking narrative, delightful short stories and allegorical landscapes with extraordinary images. Delve into the mysteries of existence and life and discover a fantastic world imbued with philosophical insights in Ashish Jaiswal’s True Dummy – a magical tale about the deepest human ambitions. ---------- ‘…a fascinating piece of literature which carries a very powerful message for the youth of this world to follow values and objectives that transcend a mechanical existence...’ - Dr. R. K. Pachauri, Chairman, IPCC – co-recipient Nobel Peace Prize, 2007
